column4: whats a good mp3 player for linux could i wine winamp or is there an even better mp3 player?
a lot, ubuntu comes with rhythmbox as default, banshee is also good
i believe you can even use skins of winamp with audacios
like i said, rhythmbox is the default music player in ubuntu, you will need to install gstreamer codecs or fluendo for mp3 support
